content.html: The XRDS-Simple plugin obviously worked, but your plugin still doesn\'t. I rebuilt the permalink structure, rebuilt the plugin\'s tables, and finally cleared my super cache and still nothing. I wonder if it has anything to do with the fact that I\'m testing it with my openid, blaenkdenum.myopenid.com and the fact that that site is also its delegate, though I didn\'t have this problem before.
